Index.donateText: Together, we can protect vulnerable wildlife, conserve vital habitats, and build a future where people live in harmony with nature. Give to Khomyn Tal National Park today and power our global conservation solutions. Your donation makes you a member a Partner in Conservation

Footer.company1: 2024 Khomyn Talyn Takhi NGO. Tous droits réservés.

Tourism.description: Observer les chevaux de Przewalski dans l'immensité de la steppe et des dunes, apercevoir des bouquetins de Sibérie, des gazelles de Mongolie, des antilopes de la taïga et des traces de loups dans le sable, admirer un aigle des steppes dans le ciel : la réserve protégée du Mont Seer, à 1 400 kilomètres à l'ouest d'Oulan-Bator.

Adoption.title1: Join the movement to save the Przewalski's horse, the Takhi, from extinction!
Adoption.text1: Join the movement to save the Przewalski's horse, the Takhi, from extinction! These majestic creatures, once extinct in the wild, are making a comeback thanks to conservation efforts. In Mongolia, where the Takhi has been reintroduced since 1992, their numbers are slowly growing, but they still need our help to thrive. By adopting a Takhi foal, you can play a crucial role in their conservation. Your support will not only contribute to the care and protection of these endangered horses but also aid in community involvement and habitat conservation efforts in places like the Khomyn Tal.Join us in ensuring a future for the Takhi in the wild. Adopt a foal today and be a part of this incredible journey towards saving a species from the brink of extinction. Together, we can make a difference.
Adoption.text2: When you choose a name for a foal, simply transfer $200 to account number 470020830 at our TDB. This contribution enables you to give the Takhi foal a name.We'll notify you of the given name after we've reviewed our genealogical data to ensure it doesn't coincide with existing names. Thank you for your support in safeguarding these incredible creatures!
Adoption.text3: As part of the process, you can choose and name foals born in 2020. Below is a table providing information on foals available for naming. Once you've made your selection, we'll notify you of the chosen foal and send you details and photos of its mother and father. Choosing a Meaningful Name for Your Foal: Birthplaces, Organization Names, Motivational Words, and More
Adoption.title4: After Naming a Foal: What Comes Next?
Adoption.text4: Your chosen foal will be given a unique personal number assigned by our team, this genealogical database encompassing all foals worldwide. You'll receive quarterly updates about your foal, its habitat, and group, accompanied by photos, directly from the Takhi newsroom. Stay connected with the progress of your chosen foal and its environment through regular updates.
Adoption.text5: Thank you for your invaluable support. Together, we're making a difference in safeguarding this remarkable species for future generations to cherish
